mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESCRIPTION, ROLE_TYPE1, ROLE_TYPE2, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, IS_DELETE, ROLE_SHIRO
mapper.insert:
insert into ts_role
ROLE_ID,
ROLE_NAME,
ROLE_DESCRIPTION,
ROLE_TYPE1,
ROLE_TYPE2,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,
IS_DELETE,
ROLE_SHIRO,
#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update ts_role
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_TYPE1 = #{roleType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_TYPE2 = #{roleType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
ROLE_SHIRO = #{roleShiro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ts_role set ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_TYPE1 = #{roleType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_TYPE2 = #{roleType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, ROLE_SHIRO = #{roleShiro,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tr.* from ts_role tr left join ts_user_role tur on tr.ROLE_ID = tur.ROLE_ID where tur.USER_ID = #{userid}
select * from ts_role tr where tr.ROLE_NAME != "超级管理员"

select count(tr.ROLE_ID) from ts_role tr WHERE tr.IS_DELETE = false
and tr.ROLE_ID = #{stringParam1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
